Name: Player
Text: Only 20$ for this acient Ra's necklace. That's a jackpot!

Name: Ra
Text: ...Don't tell me you paid that much for this toy.

Name: Player
Text: Wait, am I the only one seeing this falcon speaking?

Name: Player
Text: It have to be that kebab! God dammit..

Name: Ra
Text: The chosen one must not dare to mock god of the sun!

Name: Ra
Text: I will show you, what does it mean to wield the power of Ra.

Name: Ra
Text: Acient manuscripts are worth more than this fakery you bought.

Name: Ra
Text: Here. Take the power of my eye.

Name: Player
Text: Wrong call, it's still this kebab.

Name: Ra
Text: Don't fool around, traveller. This manuscript will allow you to use the power of sun.

Name: Ra
Text: Try to save the world from the enemies of Sun I have to battle every day.
